segments.text: I notice the boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far that the stool is about to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting below him, ready to catch a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get in trouble if the woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable—it’s making me nervous just watching it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re being so reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is getting everywhere, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will fall before the woman even notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess, and it’s only going to get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn’t tip over and hurt him.
segments.speaker: PAR
